definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: The fifth chapter mainly discusses its transfer during Wei and Jin dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 第五章主要討論相和歌辭在魏晉時期的轉型問題。

sentences.english: After it was done, I synched the song up to all these home videos of her, and my family.
sentences.chinese: 之後，我把那些相關的家庭錄像和歌搭配起來。

sentences.english: The language form and recounting nature of Xiang He Ge were also influenced deeply by the song po- em performance.
sentences.chinese: 其語言形式與敘事特色也深受相和歌表演藝術的影響。

sentences.english: The western prefecture of Wakayama ordered20, 000 people to evacuate after further tsunami warnings.
sentences.chinese: 和歌山西部地區在海嘯警報後要求2萬戶居民撤離。

sentences.english: This is the website of The Wakayama Medical University.
sentences.chinese: 這是和歌山醫科大學的網站。

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
antiphon (i.e. solo voice answered by chorus)/sung reply (in agreement with first voice)/to reply with a poem in the same rhythm
to sing opera music (without staging or make up)
